content.p: In addition to named Officers of the University as laid out in the Statutes, the Council shall, from time to time, appoint a Chief Financial Officer, a Chief Digital Officer and such other Officers of the University as may be deemed necessary with such duties and upon such terms and conditions as it shall deem fit. (amendment approved July 2017) Return to Ordinances list Trent Building University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD telephone: +44 115 951 5761 fax: +44 115 951 5739 email: registrars@nottingham.ac.uk
